snippet: In an interview with the police, Dr. Conrad Murray said he gave Michael Jackson milder drugs to help him sleep before resorting to the powerful anesthetic that killed him.
lead_paragraph: In an interview with the police, Dr. Conrad Murray said he gave Michael Jackson milder drugs to help him sleep before resorting to the powerful anesthetic that killed him.

headline.main: Doctor Tells How Jackson Sought Sleep
headline.print_headline: Doctor Tells How Jackson Lacked Sleep
headline.seo: Doctor Tells How Michael Jackson Sought Sleep
